resources.string: Pour le bon fonctionnement de UnivMap, veuillez activez la géolocalisation.
Default Languages - set your system language as the language to use for the UnivMap application. If you want to choose another language than your system language, please uncheck this option.
To access the languages below, please deactivate the option \"Default languages\" (above).
Choose the background color for the app.
You can contact us by sending us an Email.
